Blog.post: tOdAy iS pHylliS's biRthDay .. mE and my uSuAl grOup oF fRiEnds dEciDed tO gO tO tAMpiNes mAll aNd cElEbrAte bOth pHyllis And cliNtOn biRthdAy (cliNt biRthdAy wAs oN fRi) .. wE hAd a gAme oF bAsketbAll bEfoRe wE go .. i aLLey hoOp tWicE todAy .. mAn it wAs fUn .. aNd cliNtOn diD a dUnk .. coOL .. aFtEr tHAt wE dEciDe to gO mEEt tHE giRls .. wE wEre wAlkin hAlf wAy tO kFc wHen pHyllis pHoNE rAng .. it wAs xiAo pinG .. wE tHought sHE wAs cOmin bUt aCtuAlly nOt .. sHE's gOt tUitiOn at 4 .. sO sHe's nOt gOin .. sHe wAs wAitiN fOR 203 estHEr .. sO wE Ask hEr tO meet uS At kFc wHilE wE gUys gO anD chAnge .. wEe cHew lEft hiS wALlet iN thE tOilet .. lUCkiLy i fOund it .. aFtEr wE chAnge we mEt eSther and stElla ... stElla wAve gOod byE tO mE anD wEe chEW .. thOugh wE dUnNo hEr .. sHE stiLL wAve gOodbyE tO us .. mE and wEe cHew wEre bOth puZzle .. (-_-) ? aFtEr tHAt wE dEcidE tO tAke a tAxi tO tAmpiNEs mALL aS it wAs rAthEr lAte .. wE dEciDed to cElebrAte pHylliS biRthdAy at sEoUl gArden .. mAn it wAs eX ! tHe 7 oF uS sPend a tOtAl oF s$100.40 .. siAo .. bUt wAs aLL wOrTh it aFter i eNtEr tHE rEstAurant .. tHere wAS a widE vAriEty oF fOod .. u mAy rEfiLL tHE dRiNk As mAny tiME as u wANt .. wE wEre aLL fUll aftEr tHat .. aftER oUr LunCh wE dEciDE tO pLAy oUR uSuAl gAme .. YEs .. sEcrEt nO. .. wE aLL kAnA aNd wAi kAi wAs tHE soLE suRviVoR .. aFtER tHE gAme All oF uS fElt siCk .. wE wErE hAvin tuMMyache .. bUt wAsnt vEry sErioUS .. wEll .. eXcept tHE biRthDAy giRl .. sHE viSitEd tHE tOilEt qUitE a nO . oF tiMEs .. tHis wAs bAd .. i gOt hOmE at aRound 7 .15 .. tHe giRls aND i wEnt tO bUy tiBits fOR tHE tOmORroW mOViE ..hm .. sO siAn .. oH yEAh .. kAh jun , wEe cHEw , cLiNt aNd mE dEcide tO cReatE a Blog tHiS sAtuRdAy at kAH juN hOuse aFtEr tHE 2.4km rUn .. hM .. Ok .. gUEss i shAll stOP hEre ... tHankS For ReADin .. *~ hiGhLiGht oF tHE dAy : diD aN aLLey hoOp tWicE .. mUahAhA .......

tHEre wAs a HeAvy dOWnpOur tOday .. gReAt wEatHEr fOR a sLEep .. tOdAy tHEre wAsn't aNytHing sPEciAL .. aFter sChOol wE hAd a pW couRse .. dAMn siAn.. plAy pOOl aLL dAy ..aftEr tHE cOurSE i gOt baNd .. i'Ve actUAlly pLaNNed tO gO .. bUt tOmorroW gOnnA bE pHylliS b'dAe .. sO wE pLAn tO bUy hER pReSent tOdAy .. bUt aS i mEntiOn eArliEr , i 'vE gOt bAnd lA ..sO dUnno whiCh oNE tO go ..So lOng hAbeN gO bAnd .. qUitE miSS tHE dAys i hAVe iN tHere .. sO i dEciDe tO fLip a cOin tO dEtErmiNE wHethEr i sHouLd gO fOR bANd oR eAst pOint .. i hAd 3 fLips .. aLthOugh it hAs dEteRmine mE tO gO bAnd .. i dUnno wHy tHAt i lAter dEcidE tO gO eAst pOint .. sO .. mE , cLint , wAi kAi , PhylIiS aNd jiA wEn aLL wEnt tO eAst pOint lOr .. siAn .. wHOLE dAY tHere wE mEt viShAAl .. oUr buDgEt wEre limitEd ..sO tHErE wEre liMitEd tHingS wE coUld buy .. wE aLL dEciDed tO diScuSs it At a fOod cOurt .. i oRDerEd a plAtE oF fRies .. We all deciDed tHAt wE shAll buy pHyllis pReSent tml .. aND cElebrAte hEr b'dAe at eithEr oNE oF thEse pLAcEs : sWeNsEn , sEouL gArdEn oR sAkAe sUshi .. cAn't wAit tiL toMorRow .. OK ..gUEss shAll stOp hEre .. thANks fOR rEadin ! *~ hiGhLiGht oF tHE niGHt : nOthiN ..

tOday , mE , wEE chEW , xiAO piNg , wAi kAi , cLintOn , kAh jUn , pHylliS aNd jiA wEn wEnt tO lOng jOhn siLvEr aFtEr sChoOl .. We hAd a gReAt tiME theRe i bOught a cOmbO 1 .. so dId tHE othErS .. wE lAtEr hAD "seCret no." agAIn .. aND wE goT a nEw cOmER tOO .. xiAo piNg .. hAha .. wEE chEw waS tHE onE mAkin thE sEcRet recipE .. tHEre wAs A lOt oF chiLLi , mYoniSe , pEpsi .. etC .. wHilE mixin .. tHErE cAme viVek gAng .. xiANg yiNg and viVek appEaL tO tAstE tHE "seCrEt rEciPE" (eWww...) i wAs sHOcK tHAt tHEy sAY iT wAs tAsty .. ( '_' ) ? aND tHE gAme staRts .. aNd afTeR 3 nO. , xIAo piNg WAs tHE fiRSt oNE tO kEna ... wE plAYed 8 timEs aNd tHiS wAs tHE rEsult : 4 timEs -- xiAo piNg , 2 tiMEs -- pHyllis aND tHE otHers aLL oNE .. whiLE wE wEre plAyin .. We alSo mEt "fiFi" and tHe 3 tiME bAbE oF tHE yeAR .. siAn .. sHE coME iN giVE a stUpid fAce .. ( fEEl liKe slAppin hEr) .. lAter We rEtuEn tO sChoOl fOR coMManDo tRAininG .. wE PLAy a gAme oF soCCeR .. lAter pRocEEd tO oUR trAInin .. wE wERe aSk tO sHOut tHE coMMand .. wEE chEw and sAdiQ was tHE loudeSt .. so thEy wEre eXpEcted tO bE thE oNE shoUtin tHE coMMand evErydAY .. All oF uS aRe hAvin a liTTle sOrE thROat afTer tHE tRAinin .. (eRhem ..) mAN .. mY tHroat stiLL hUrts uP tILL nOW .. (eR hEm) i aLSo lEarn hOW to pLAy yAHoo pOOl .. goT to KNOW a fRiend cAlleD niKita tHrough tHE poOl gAme .. oKay .. gUEss i shALL wRitE tiL hEre fOr tHe dAY .. thAnks fOR reAdin ! *~ hiGhliGht oF tHE dAY : gOt tO knOW A fRiEnd cAlled niKitA .. aNd gOt soRe tHRoAt aH !!!! (*--*)

tOday wAs a greAt moNdAy .. mE , WeE chEw , cLintOn , wAi kAi , kAH jUn , jiA wEn aNd pHylliS wEnt tO piZZa hUt tO hAVe ouR lUnch .. i SPenT a totAl oF $11.90 thErE !! wE lAteR deCiDe tO plAy thE gAmE caLLed seCret coDe .. All oF uS kEna thE"seCret reCipE" [u dun wanna know wad we put inside] mAdE by mE and Wee cHEw .. thE tAstE iS alrighT .. exCepT iS a biT hoT !!! lAtEr wE pRoceeD back tO scHool .. wE mEt sAmAnthA anD gang .. wE went bAck tO schOol togEthEr .. Me and my prEfEct gANg wEnt tO thE pRefEct rOom anD wE hAd a gAme oF stRip pOker .. mE latEr dEciDe tO plAy strEss .. hAd 4 gAMes with pHylliS .. mAn it was hArd tO beat hEr .. lAter at 4.30 we Change intO ouR PE shoRTs and gET rEAdy fOR thE pFt .. waSn't rEally satiSfIEd witH mY rESult .. bUt i DiD wEll .. fAilEd nTh At All .. (pHeW ~_~'') aFtEr tHAt wE wEnt hoME .. mAn i wAs rEally tiREd ( *--* ) hA .. mE awaiTs aNothEr grEAt dAy toMoRroW .. oK think thAt'S aLL .. thAnks foR rEAdiNg .. (^-^) hightlight of the day ~ pAss mY pFt .. (*----*)

today i saw mr lee bringing his dog for a walk .. his dog was cute , no doubt .. there were many people followin him .. after school me and clint and banana went to old pyss to have our lunch .. banana mention that he is going to gentin , and were invitin me , wee chew and clinton .. all our parents has actually agreed to let us go (yes man !) coz i dun actually think my parent will allow .. later we went to the banana's house .. me and clint later got some ideas on our mind .. and we decide to play a prank on others .. it was very funny and we were all laughing none stop .. sorry xp( the pranks they play on ur sis got nth to do with me ) haha .. then we also fool vivek , banana's fren and that 3 time babe of the year (that was cool .. way cool .. muAhahahaha) hA .. lookin forward to the day we going Genting .. guess shall stop here .. that's all for tonight .. ~ highlight of the day : play a trick on 3 times babe of the year ~

today we got maths trial .. so tirin .. me , wee chew , phyllis , wai kai and clint .. we had a busy day and our brain work like siao .. the maths questions are tricky .. we answer the question with little confidence .. after the trial we were all hungry and decide to go long john silver .. had lot of fun there .. then we all talk about school life and cy .. haha ... then after i went home got the results that we had actually won the trial !! MUAHAHAHAHAHA .. that's so cool .. hm .. wonder what's the prize .. ok la guess shall stop here .. *~hiGhLigHt oF tHE dAy : wOn tHE mAThs triAL *_*

today was bored at school .. mr liew and miss jew didn't come to school today .. had 3 lessons free (so shiok ) .. me , xp , and wee chew went helpin mr ng to paste poster around the school .. kind of fun .. then after sch liao went to play soccer at the field .. sux .. mr chan go and confiscate our soccer ball ... sian !! then we had prefects general meetings .. got a new t-shirt .. then have the life sci thingy .. quite fun and interestin lesson today .. really enjoy .. after that we went home.. haiz .. nth much liao .. guess i shall end here ~ ~_- * awaits another day at school ~

today was no diff from the past five days .. i was still sick ,no doubt ... i am itchin all over .. and i dun like the feelings of this .. yesterday we went to kah jun house .. me clint and wee chew .. then we go century square to watch spiderman 2[reccomended] .. the movie was nice and i enjoy every part of it .. we all thinks that the next spiderman movie is going to feature hobgoblin .. i can't wait till the next episode aww~
